title: M8: Key in NMT
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: intermediate. * SUPERVISION: self-assessment/teacher guided. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 5 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: none. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: not necessary. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: different alternatives can be considered as solutions, it is maybe worth to discuss some "failed answers" and see if they make sense.
